mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{param1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pwd=#{param2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into member(name, id, pwd, phone, addr_code, addr_main, addr_side) values(#{param1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param4}, #{param5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param7, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{param1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
